Best Bond since Connery. More believable and less gimmicks.
Great value, he is the best Bond!
As described and arrived on time
Great packaging for the first 3 movies starring Daniel Craig as 007!
I love him

The Daniel Craig Collection includes the first 3 movies he did as "James Bond 007". He replaced Pierce Brosnan in the "Bond" role.
Inside the MGM box is the plastic container that opens up with 3 discs. Skyfall (2015) is first, but is the third movie.
The proper order should be: Casino Royale (2006), Quantum of Solace (2008) and Skyfall (2012).
 A flyer is enclosed for you to get your digital HD of all three movies that you many instantly stream and download for computer, tablet and smartphone. Your "redemption code" is on this flyer.

Casino Royale (2006). Widescreen. Rated PG-13. Running Time: 2 hours, 24 mins.
Directed by Martin Campbell.
The 21st film in the series.
This movie takes the James Bond story back to the beginning when Bond was just promoted and given his "007".

First scene begins in black & white and changes to color during the traditional gun barrel scene.

In the cast: Daniel Craig, Judi Dench, Mads Mikkelsen, Jesper Christensen, Christina Cole,  Caterina Murino, Simon Abkarian, Claudio Santamaria, Eva Green, Giancarlo Giamnini, Jeffrey Wright, Tom So, Lazar Ristovski, Infantie, Ivan G'Vera.

Tsai Chin is at the gambling table as "Madame Wu". In You Only Live Twice (1967), she was "Ling".
Diane Hartford is "Player #3". In Thunderball (1965), she was "Girl in Kiss Kiss Club" with Sean Connery and only had three lines.
EON Producer Michael G. Wilson appears as "Chief of Police" who is arrested.

Option of language and subtitles: English, French, Spanish.
____________________
Quantum of Solace (2008). Widescreen. Rated PG-13. Running Time: One hour, 46 mins.
Directed by Marc Forster.
The 22nd film in the series.
A direct continuation from the end of Casino Royale (2006). It is 45 minutes later.

In the cast:  Daniel Craig, Judi Dench, Jeffrey Wright, Rory Kinnear, Jesper Christensen, Giancarlo Giamnini, Olga Kurylenko, Mathieu Almaric, Joaquin Cosio, Anatole Taubman, David Harbour, Tim Piggot-Smith, Fernando Guillen Cueruo,
EON Producer, Michael G, Wilson is the man sitting in chair in the Haitian Hotel lobby.

Option of language: English, Spanish, French.  Option of Subtitles: English, Spanish.

Special Features: "Another Way To Die" music video, Theatrical Teaser Trailer #1, Theatrical Trailer #2.
____________________
Skyfall (2012). Widescreen. Rated PG-13. Running Time: 2 hours, 22 mins.
Directed by Sam Mendes.
The 23rd film in the series.

In the cast: Daniel Craig, Judi Dench, Rory Kinnear, Naomi Harris, Ralph Fiennes, Ben Whishaw, Javier Bardem, Berenice Marlohe, Ola Rapace, Helen McCrory, Albert Finney.

Cameo appearances by Wolf Blitzer and Huw Edwards.

Option of Language: English Dolby Digital 5.1, English Descriptive Audio 5.1, Spanish Surround Dolby Digital 2.0, French Surround Dolby Digital 2.0.
Option of subtitles: English, Spanish.

Extras: Shooting Bond, Theatrical Trailer, Soundtrack Promotional Spot.

No audio commentary on any disc and no deleted or extended scenes.

The next movie, SPECTRE (2015), Not in this DVD collection because it had not been released yet (but is added in newer releases of this DVD collection).
The next movie is to be released on November 8, 2019. Daniel Craig returns for his last Bond movie.
Casino Royale is the best modern 007 movie in my view. Skyfall is in second place and shows that Craig is a good Bond. However, the only reason he is not great is Quantum of Solace.
Great
I really enjoyed watching all of these movies, quite a few times and I plan on watching them often.  I truly believe that Daniel Craig is the best Bond.
Must have!!
Great. Very reasonable price. This is not Blu Ray, however. Just regular DVD. But great quality and awesome movies!
A Xmas gift for my son-in-law and he loves it.
Excellent deal! Love it.

I thoroughly enjoyed watching Daniel Craig, the "Blonde Bond", in action. As we all know, all of our James Bond actors have been handsome dark haired devils.  In my opinion it was a nice change for them to find an actor who looked a bit different, but was completely as great in the part as the other actors were.  I am a great one for wanting the "whole" story about our film heroes and these films definitely laid the foundation. It was refreshing to see him fall in love.  In my opinion the other films seemed to make him a womanizing romeo.  In these films you actually saw him as his heart was broken again and again.  Thanks Amazon for making it possible for me to indulge myself with these films.

Daniel Craig is by far the second best 007...only behind Sean. These movies are good enough that you'll want to watch them again and again. Only thing bad about the set is it's missing the final film and you'll have to purchase it separately.

Daniel Craig is the best Bond to date. He personifies the ultimate spy genre to a 'T'. Part macho thug, part urbane gamester, part wily adversary, with the hidden hints of a heart that wants real love.

Casino Royale is the best Bond movie I've seen. Truly credible plot, masterful, rather than cartoony,  villains,  the wonderful Dame Judy Dench as M, and a gorgeously tragic heroine. Wonderful action sequences, and beautifully shot.

The other 2 movies in the collection are good too. Ian Fleming wrote juicy villains,  but a bit shallow on the women, though screen writers have tried to make them more than cardboard cutout seductresses with weaponry.

Thoroughly enjoyable spy capers.

One of the discs does not work at all in the set.
It was cheap, so I guess you get what you pay for.
Still disappointed.
Whats not to love? It's Daniel Craig...

I love Craig as 007.  He's not only a great actor, but athlete.
Great movie

Craig James Bond set very nice indeed, 3 movies for 17 dollars and all 3 movies played in my dvd player.  I will admit though Skyfall had a small moment where it had a hipcup in the playing for 4 seconds and rest of the movie played great so I am not worried about a few seconds hipcup as long as rest plays fine.  As for the 3 movies themselves very nice locations, exotic scenes, and amazing stunts and action scenes that will make your jaw drop open when watching these movies.  I don't agree he is a the best Bond because of the other Bond movies I have had the pleasure of watching during my lifetime.  Still he is pretty good at the role, still have to watch the 4th movie of his that just came out on dvd.  But in closing if your looking for 3 great Bond movies full of excitment, action scenes, and exotic locations then pick these movies up for a great price of 17 dollars or least that is what I payed for them.
Love this man. He is the best Bond ever.
Great deal!
He's one of the better 007's, but lacks character somehow. good fighter though!
If you enjoy James Bond, this collection is your cup-of-tea for excitement.

big fan the collection is great.  if you like Daniel Craig you love this.
